General.Name: Faraday Future Intelligent Electric Inc
General.Description: Faraday Future Intelligent Electric Inc. engages in the design, development, manufacture, engineering, sale, and distribution of electric vehicles and related products in the United States. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 18455 South Figueroa Street, Gardena, CA, United States, 90248
